Summary: red flash of light and 4 hours were lost
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my brothers had goe to town at about 11:30 pm to check our dog at the pound and as we were going up the road behind our home there was a red flash of light and then the car slowely pulled into the drive way and we had lost 4 hours and it fet like we were gone only 20 minuets
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rifle
This sighting has never been favorited.
